page.title: 05Shopping Survey
page.content: {Shopping Survey Taken From 52 Adults {Living In Domesday Survey Area. 1.Do you work in Moniaive? YES=18 NO=34 2.Do you live in Moniaive? YES=18 NO=34 3.Where do you shop? IN VILLAGE=16 THORNHILL=6 DUMFRIES=30 4.Do you use public transport? YES=6 NO=46 5.Do Moniaive shops cater for all your needs? YES=14 NO=38 6.Are Moniaive shops'prices compared to Dumfries shops'prices TOO DEAR=42 CHEAP=0 ABOUT RIGHT=10 7.Do you regularly shop at a freezer centre? YES=6 NO=46 8.Would a lack of shops ever make you consider living somewhere else? YES=2 NO=50
